name: Lezyne, Mini GPS, Computer, GPS: Yes, HR: Yes (Chest), Cadence: Optional, Black

features:
Bluetooth Connectivity
Connect to heart rate, speed, cadence, and power sensors
Best screen resolution in its class 
Compact size, keeps more handlebar and stem space
Pairing to android and iPhone for notifications and many added features
Turn by turn navigation and directions to a location or pre-determined route
Breadcrumb mapping tracks the route taken while recording and indicates your current location
Strava Live segments indication to compete with friends for that KOM
Live Tracking for your selected friends and family to see your location and ride stats during your ride
